author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: All that is gold does not glitter, not all those who wander are lost.

author: H.P. Lovecraft
quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.

author: Stephen King
quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.

author: Neil Gaiman
quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.

author: Ursula K. Le Guin
quote: We live in a society exquisitely balanced on the edge of chaos, and as likely to fall into barbarism as into utopia.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote: The trouble with the world is that the stupid are cocksure and the intelligent are full of doubt.

author: Douglas Adams
quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.

author: Margaret Atwood
quote: Men are afraid that women will laugh at them. Women are afraid that men will kill them.

author: Octavia Butler
quote: The only people who fear books are those who want to destroy freedom of thought.
